author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch to XA support - so that by default Bridge MDOs will work with XA if they have XA connections

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for XA message consumption.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for setting the default delivery mode on a Messenger.
This allows you to specify in a Messenger.xml something like
to by default enable or disable persistent message delivery. This delivery mode is then defaulted on any MessageProducer.
You can override this delivery mode later if required on a per MessageProducer basis, but at least this mechanism provides a simple defaulting mechanism on a per Messenger basis

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the readme to bring it up to date with the latest Maven instructions

author: jstrachan
msg: Refactored the subscription mechanism into a reusable SubscriptionManager. This allows code to be shared between the stand alone messagelet engine and the ManagerServlet.
Also added an option for a <consumerThread> which allows for a plugin point for performing transactional message consumption
